definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The cross section design is an important part of the road design.
sentences.chinese: 道路橫斷面設計是道路設計的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The process of subgrade drainage and railway-use land design is related with cross section design directly.
sentences.chinese: 路基排水用地設計與橫斷面設計成果直接相關。

sentences.english: The dominant plane for showing the parapharyngeal space was suggested.
sentences.chinese: 並提出咽旁間隙在橫斷面上的最佳顯示平面。

sentences.english: Seed flattened dorsally in cross section, face concave .
sentences.chinese: 種子背面扁平在橫斷面上，表面凹。

sentences.english: Also this paper discusses the cross-sectional elements and the cross-sectional forms of the connected-way.
sentences.chinese: 探討了銜接道路橫斷面構成要素和採用的橫斷面形式。

sentences.english: Also this paper discusses the cross-sectional elements and the cross-sectional forms of the connected-way.
sentences.chinese: 探討了銜接道路橫斷面構成要素和採用的橫斷面形式。

sentences.english: Method cluster sampling and cross sectional study.
sentences.chinese: 方法整羣抽樣，橫斷面調查。

sentences.english: The domes are circular or ovoid in cross-section .
sentences.chinese: 穹丘的橫斷面爲圓形或卵圓形。

sentences.english: The domes are circular or ovoid in cross - section .
sentences.chinese: 穹丘的橫斷面爲圓形或卵圓形。

sentences.english: Here is a transverse MRI scan that reveals the lobulated ependymoma .
sentences.chinese: 橫斷面MRI顯示分葉狀室管膜瘤。
